release.action: Read metadata only for tables in verify data set.
Fix setup and verify is executed for test methods only.

release.description: Enable verify integers in hexa format.
release.action: Enable verify integers in hexa format.
Switch git repo to github.
Fix TestNG support.
Minor fixes.
Add Informix support.
Load files from dependency jars.
Add support for TestNG.

release.description: Spring runner. Short dataset file names. Performace improvement.
release.action: Cache DBUnit connections. Performance improvement.
Add LightAirSpringRunner: LightAir JUnit runner with support for Spring.
Add support for dataset files named only by the test method.

release.description: Fix @auto on wide tables. Support DB default values.
release.action: Fix method annotation overrides class annotation even when one is List and the other is not.
Fix clear cache of auto values between test runs.
Add proper support for DB default values.

release.description: Fix remove absolute system path from pom.
release.action: Fix remove absolute system path from pom. Caused problems on Windows.

release.description: Fix generate @auto with correct row index.
release.action: Fix generate @auto with correct row index.

release.description: Token @auto. Profiles. Configurable properties file location
release.action: Add support for DB views.
Add token @auto.
Add support for profiles - connections to multiple databases.
Enable configure location of Light Air properties file using system property.
Add support for duration in temporal tokens.
Use datasource to pool database connections.
Add support for Informix.
